divs: sighting detailslooking at bright stars in front of my house in the orion's belt (due south direction) when out of the south-west came a slow moving, very bright orb. it stood out as the stars in the area are white\blue in color. was looking for some clue as to its possible definition. ie regular strobe lights- we have 2 major airports within 5 miles. nothing at all. thought it was a hot air balloon flame at first. but was too high and too fast. much larger and brighter than any plane and several planes were outbound from sfo on a northern flightpath. it appeared to be randomly glowing. orange, yellow and red were the prominant colors. approx. 4000 to 5000 feet up on a west to east (no change in direction) trajectory. slowly went across the night sky before vanishing abruptly.
trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There was one other sighting in San Francisco on or around February 9th 2013
Summary: was looking at some bright stars in the orion area when this very bright flame-like light appeared
